def_cn: 杂草丛生的；植被蔓生的
def_en: If a garden or other place is overgrown, it is covered with a lot of untidy plants because it has not been looked after.

def_cn: （成年人）不成熟的，孩子气的
def_en: If you describe an adult as an overgrown child, you mean that their behaviour and attitudes are like those of a child, and that you dislike this.
